---
title: 'Introduction'
description: 'Connect to your existing Observablity Platform'
---

Doku streamlines the observability experience by delivering processed LLM data right to the observability platform you are already familiar with. We recognize how crucial it is for developers to aggregate all application-related data, encompassing LLM usage metrics, into a single source of truth.

This integration allows you to visualize and assess your entire application landscape in one integrated Observability platform, thereby refining your monitoring approaches and sharpening your decision-making.

Below is a list of observability platforms that work seamlessly with Doku, allowing for integrated and expanded insights.

<CardGroup cols={2}>
